Title: Insecure Deserialization
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.29, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.13, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.4.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.29 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.13 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.4.1
